items.title:
ğŸ¤ QIE-2511 can be A GOOD FRIEND of Flux.2 Klein 9B.

ğŸ§  2511 is very strong at consistency and human anatomy generation, while Klein 9B excels at details and lighting.

âœ¨ Combining these two models can achieve an ideal result.

ğŸ–¼ï¸ The four examples below show the generation process from face to portrait: first generate the base image with 2511, then use Klein 9B to enhance image quality, details, and lighting.
